home: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denoucing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avaoids pleasure  itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounters consequences that are.
